official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Fishing and Boating Week.

summary.text: Supports the goals and ideals of National Fishing and Boating Week. Urges the people of the United States to recognize such a week as an opportunity to learn more about boating.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Fishing and Boating Week.
